description:
This course is not more than 60 min of Bernina Software 7, and the eleventh course of twenty courses where you will learn to Edit any object or design.

  • Use the Edit selection in the side Toolbox, and work through the options
  • Add and Remove Holes: work through the options and know hows.
  • Fill holes, change colors and discuss options on steps to take.
  • Create new objects to create a design, learn how to change objects.
  • Duplicate, cloning and copy and paste is a way to add more creativity to any design

..................................................................................................

Class 12:

  • Use stitch angels for perfect finish off a design.
  • Final finishes of a design is normally the outlines, enjoy your options
  • Fill holes, change colors and discuss options on steps to take.
  • Create new objects to create a design, learn how to change objects.
  • Stitch angles are my favourite tool for the most exiting results.
title: #11/12: Bernina Software 7 Master the Fundamentals Edit-bar
